President Trump has abused the power of the Presidency obstructed Congress and remains a serious threat to our national security. Tonight our committee set rules for the impeachment debate.

There are no more excuses for those who want to ignore the facts instead of defending the Constitution. And there are no more excuses for those who would turn a blind eye while the President pressures foreign actors to interfere with our democracy.

The evidence against Donald Trump is irrefutable and his actions amount to an impeachable offense. There are no longer any excuses for those in Congress who want to focus on process instead of the substance of the President’s wrongdoing.

Over the course of the impeachment inquiry we have combed over thousands of pages of documents. Congress and the American people have heard credible testimony from brave civil servants who detailed how far the President went to abuse power.
